General.Name: Inventec Besta Co Ltd
General.Description: Inventec Besta Co.,Ltd engages in the design, research, development, manufacture, and sale of electronic and electrical dictionaries, and digital products in Taiwan, Japan, the Czech Republic, Singapore, Malaysia, the United States, Canada, and others. It also engages in the cloud business, as well as investment management activities. The company was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.
